title: Void Illaoi Missing Ult Effects
body: I have no video proof, but I played an ARAM yesterday with Illaoi and every time I used my ult it wouldn’t show the majority of the VFX. The jump and the landing are missing. It’s like she drops it like it’s hot {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body:
Hey Piccolo Rick! 
Thanks for the report! I'm seeing everything in order on my end, but if you happen to encounter it again, please ping me in this thread! In the meantime, I'd suggest doing a client repair to be on the safe side!
